meanings.definition: Living within the substrate of a body of water.

meanings.definition: Organisms that live within the sediment at the bottom of a body of water.

meanings.sent2: Divers marveled at the diversity of infaunal species dwelling in the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The infaunal community organized a talent show under the sea.
